duties_responsibilities.duty: Work closely with front office leadership on knowledge management capabilities.
Assist with the establishment of a Continuity of Operations Planning (COOP).
Work with the contract support team on notetaking and general organization of a Balance Scorecard effort.
Develop PowerPoint slide visualizations and presentations for various parts of the organization.
Assist with managing front office Sharepoint page.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors degree in Public Policy, Political Science, Communications, Law, or Business Administration (Preferred)
